description: NHL 25-accurate strategy map for Leafs Dynasty AI. Only uses in-game options: forecheck, NZ, DZ pressure, DZ strategy, offensive strategy, trap slider, control breakout, quick breakout, plus per-line slider templates.

forecheck.notes: Forecheck options exactly as listed in NHL 25 team strategy menu.

neutral_zone.notes: These are the only NZ trap options available in NHL 25.

trap_slider.notes: 0 = no trap, 6 = maximum trap. Leafs Canon sits in the middle by default and adjusts per matchup.

dz_pressure.notes: Exact defensive pressure options from NHL 25. No legacy labels (e.g. 'contain along the wall').

dz_strategy.notes: These are the only defensive strategies in NHL 25 team strategies.

offensive_strategy.notes: Global offensive pressure setting used in the team strategy screen.

control_breakout.notes: Control breakout options from NHL 25. Canon can switch between them based on opponent forecheck.

quick_breakout.notes: Quick breakout choices used when the puck is recovered quickly in the DZ.

line_slider_template.description: Template for line/pair sliders that must always match the in-game 0–10 format Austin uses.

forward_line.notes: Each forward line has these four sliders with a 0–10 range. Canon will store recommended values in the SliderEngine file, not here.

defense_pair.notes: Each D pair has Hold Line/Pinch and Cycle/Shoot sliders with 0–10 range. Default values will live in SliderEngine_v5.0.json.

architect_gpt.notes: Architect GPT can reference these exact option names when building Canon or matchup logic. No legacy systems allowed.

dynasty_gpt.notes: Leafs Dynasty GPT uses this map to keep all gameplay recommendations 100% NHL 25 accurate.
